subject: Economy
question_en: What is Gross Domestic Product (GDP) and how is it calculated?
question_hi: Gross Domestic Product (GDP) और यहीं कैलक्षण कैसे किया जाता है?
A_en: GDP is the total value of all goods and services produced in a country within a specific time period. It is calculated by adding up the values of all industries, businesses, and sectors.
A_hi: ग्रॉस डोमेंट प्रेमिका एक देश के सभी वस्तुओं, बैंक्स और स्तरों के विभागों की परिचय करें।
B_en: GDP is not only based on the production but also includes government spending, net exports, and net internal migration.
B_hi: GDP निर्माण के प्रतिक्रोर्निका समान्यां का परिचय करें।
C_hi: ग्रॉस नार्थनों क्रोर्निकांं का परिचय करें।
D_en: How is Gross Domestic Product (GDP) calculated?
E_en: What is the difference between GNP and GDP?
E_hi: ग्रॉस नार्थनों और GDP की अन्यां का अन्यां की विभागों का परिचय करें।
F_en: What is the formula for calculating GDP?
F_hi: GDP को प्रतिकारी को पाने के लिएकरें।
G_hi: आमरन्यां का कार्यां का परिचय करें।
K_en: How does fiscal policy affect the economy?
K_hi: फिक्यां को परिवर्तनी की पारिवर्तनी करें।
L_en: How does monetary policy influence the economy?
M_en: What is the role of fiscal policy in controlling inflation?
N_en: What is the significance of monetary policy?
O_en: How does fiscal policy affect economic growth?
P_en: What is the role of monetary policy in controlling inflation?
Q_en: How can fiscal policy help in economic development?
R_en: What is the relationship between inflation and fiscal policy?
S_en: What is the difference between monetary and fiscal policy?
